After the Wind: 1996 Everest Tragedy One Surviivor's Story bụ akwụkwọ nke Lou Kasischke dere nke na-akọwa ahụmahụ ya dị ka onye ahịa na njem Rob Hallá n'oge ọdachi nke Ugwu Everest na afọ 1996
Ihe mberede ahụ gburu ndị na-arịgo asatọ gụnyere anọ sitere na njem Hall ma bụrụ ihe mberedo kachasị njọ n'elu Everest ruo mgbe ugwu Everest nke afọ 2014
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwere ihe osiseiri ise na ise nke Jane Cardinal ma bipụta ya na afọ 2014 site na ndị mbipta aha bụ Good Hart Publishing.
Ọ bụ ezie na o dere akwụkwọ ahụ mgbe ọdachi ahụ gasịrị, Kasischke chere afọ iri na isii ka ọ wepụta After the Wind

Akwụkwọ ahụ na-elekwasị anya na ihe omume ndị na'elu ugwu ahụ, ahụmahụ Kasischkeʹs na ugwu, na mkpali ya maka ịtụgharị ihe dị ka mita 400 site n'ugwu ahụ, nakwa mmekọrịta chiri anya ya na nwunye ya, Sandy.
Mgbe ifufe nwetara nyocha dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ

Kirkus Reviews nyere akwụkwọ ahụ nyocha dị egwu, na-akọwa ya dị ka "ihe ncheta doro anya, nke dị nso nke, n'ụzọ doro mma na nlebara anya na nkọwa zuru ezu, nwere akụkọ ndụ a na'echefughị echefu". Blue Ink Reviews kpọrọ akwụkwọ ahụ "akụkọ ịhụnanya nke e chepụtara echepụta, nke edere nke ọma" na "nkọwa oche gị nke ịnya ụgbọ mmiri na ugwu Everest," ma nye akwụkwọ a nyocha kpakpando. A họpụtakwara ya maka 2014 Kirkus Prize maka ihe na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke a mere n'af ahụ ma bụrụ onye ikpeazụ maka ihe nrite Eric Hoffer Grand Prize na First Horizon Book Awards.
